text: You could always use the lazy load for slick as well
Other than that have you ever used Flickity?
does it have accessibility like slick does (using the `aria-` labels)? I am not seeing that. While I think its pretty nice, the aria labels are a huge plus for slick slider
Dynamic? That seems like something that could be added in the markup. Plus : <https://github.com/metafizzy/flickity/issues/66#issuecomment-200821642>
is there anyway to grab the content of a COS Page using the API? I notice its all in the widgets area but I wasnt sure if it was possible to just grab the body text like you can with blog posts
